attributes.action: close our borders to eu members
attributes.additional_details: l would like to get the govenment to stop and extract all eu members citizens from our country and give our british people jobs. with the eastern europeans coming over here to the uk and taking all the warehouse jobs,and with polish employment agencies,giving polish workers priority over our young people,what chance do they have and our govenment are blind off the fact this is going on,in our warehouses across britain.and the longer they ignore this the worst its going to get and you will find more young people leaving school will not be able to find work,so increasing the unemployment figures
